title: The Controversial Tax Policies Of Emmanuel Saez
description: Emmanuel Saez is probably one of the most controversial economists around these days. Recently, he's garnered significant attention for being one of the architects of Elizabeth Warren's wealth tax proposal. On this episode, Luigi and Kate dig into tax policy, the wealth tax and why Saez's work is so controversial.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
